content.main_text: Learn about pricing of dishes and price ranges within food courses.
content.section_1_content: Understanding pricing helps in customer service and menu management.
content.section_2_content: Different dishes have different pricing strategies.
content.section_3_content: Accurate pricing ensures proper billing and profitability.

questions.hint: Select the price that is closest to the actual listed price for this dish.

questions.question_text: What is the price range of your {food_course}?

options_variable.source: generatePriceRangeOptions(link_to_restaurant.current_dishes.filter(dish => dish.type.includes(food_course)).map(dish => dish.price).reduce((a, b) => [Math.min(a, b), Math.max(a, b)]), 40)
